thread.title: System Innovators and Elavon Release First-to-Market, Integrated EMV Credit Card Payment Processing Solutions for Government Agencies
thread.title_full: System Innovators and Elavon Release First-to-Market, Integrated EMV Credit Card Payment Processing Solutions for Government Agencies - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: System Innovators and Elavon Release First-to-Market, Integrated EMV Credit Card Payment Processing Solutions for Government Agencies
text:
EMV Certified Solution designed to ensure governments and utilities nationwide are ready for the October 1 EMV liability shift.
Jacksonville, Florida
In anticipation of the EMV liability shift, System Innovators has extended its relationship with Elavon, a leading global payments solutions provider, to offer clients a fully certified EMV solution that will help mitigate our clients’ risk of card present fraud losses.
Guy Harris, president of Elavon North America, said, “Government agencies have many of the same fraud vulnerabilities as other businesses do, and therefore need the same payments security offerings. System Innovators’ vast experience working with these organizations combined with our industry-leading payments technology will provide the right solution for any government entity looking to protect itself from fraud.”
Product Description: System Innovators offers a centralized cashiering and enterprise revenue management (ERM) solution used by 14 of the 30 largest cities, and 5 of the 20 largest counties in the country along with hundreds of other governments, state agencies and many large private utilities.
Clients use iNovah ERM to accept millions of payments each year. The iNovah ERM platform, now EMV certified with Elavon’s Simplify payment application, securely encrypts card data through Elavon’s Fusebox Gateway. This will enable governments to accept credit card payments at any government payment center location using cards with embedded Chip and PIN technology.
“We are very focused on delivering the most trusted, central cashiering and revenue management solution for governments and utilities in the nation. Partnering with Elavon on an industry-first certified EMV solution designed specifically for government and utilities will ensure our customers are ready for the EMV liability shift well ahead of the October 1 deadline,” said Jeff Sumner, EVP of System Innovators.
About System Innovators ( http://www.systeminnovators.com ):
System Innovators is a division of N. Harris Computer Corporation and a leading provider of financial management and customer information system software solutions.Enterprise revenue management offerings include fully configurable PCI compliant payment collection, cashiering and financial reporting solutions. Specializing in citizen self-service, revenue management, auditing and financial reporting, System Innovators’ products integrate seamlessly with websites, deposit banks, payment card gateway providers, and host and financial systems.
About Elavon ( http://www.elavon.com ) Twitter: @elavon
Elavon is wholly owned by U.S. Bancorp (NYSE: USB) and provides end-to-end payment processing solutions and services to more than 1.3 million customers in the United States, Europe, Canada, Mexico, Brazil and Puerto Rico. As the #1 provider for airlines and a top five provider for hospitality, healthcare, retail, and public sector/education, Elavon’s innovative payment solutions are designed to solve pain points for businesses from small to enterprise-sized.
